abstract: Amazon has cut the price of its popular electronic reading device by $60, to $299.
snippet: Amazon has cut the price of its popular electronic reading device by $60, to $299.
lead_paragraph: It’s not the holiday sales season yet, but Amazon has already cut the price of its latest Kindle model to $299, from $359 when it was introduced in February.

headline.main: Amazon Trims Price of the Kindle 2
